REBATES_ITEM_405_04.fieldLabel: Certificate of Registration with Registrar of Societies
REBATES_ITEM_405_04.tooltip: Welfare organizations must provide Certificate of Registration with Registrar of Societies
A written undertaking or application letter by the Applicant
Bill of Lading/ Waybill/ Consignment Note
Copy of Registration Certificate as a non-profit organisation in terms of the Non-Profit Organizations Act (if applicable)
Letter from Donor confirming that the goods are donated  to disabled persons or for the upliftment of indigent persons (Gift Certificate)
Invoice
Copy of Statutory Agreement (if applicable)
Copy of previous permit (if applicable).
The attached declaration must be completed by both the applicant and any other body responsible for distribution of donated goods.
Signed affidavit.
